project_name.justification: The text identifies the project in several places, including: 'Golden Lake Exploration Inc. (CSE:GLM)(OTCQB:GOLXF) ("GLM or the "Company") is pleased to announce the staking of an additional forty-six Bureau of Land Management ("BLM") lode claims totaling 924 acres near its Jewel Ridge project in Eureka County, Nevada.'

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified at the beginning of the article: 'VANCOUVER, BC / ACCESSWIRE / September 26, 2023 / Golden Lake Exploration Inc. (CSE:GLM)(OTCQB:GOLXF) ("GLM or the "Company")'

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO of the acquiring company is quoted and named at the end of the press release: '"Mike England" Mike England, CEO & DIRECTOR'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The article describes the staking of new claims which are fully owned by the company. 'The property consists of unpatented lode claims that are 100% owned by the Company, without any royalty obligations or work commitments...'

primary_commodity.justification: The authoritative metadata lists Au as the primary commodity, and the text confirms significant gold values in sampling: 'Initial selective grab samples taken by the company's geological team have returned significant precious and base metal values of up to 1.73 grams gold per tonne (g/t Au)...'

verified_article_link.justification: The article is directly about the Jewel Ridge project, as stated in the headline and body: 'Golden Lake Exploration Increases Eureka District Property Position by 50%...' and '...staking of an additional forty-six Bureau of Land Management ("BLM") lode claims totaling 924 acres near its Jewel Ridge project...'

currency.justification: The transaction was a staking of claims, not a purchase, so no currency is mentioned in the transaction terms.

cash_payments_raw.justification: No cash payment was mentioned. The company acquired the land via staking: '...pleased to announce the staking of an additional forty-six Bureau of Land Management ("BLM") lode claims...'

share_payments_raw.justification: No share payment was mentioned in the article.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: No combined cash and share payment was mentioned in the article.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of this transaction.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of this transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of this transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued, so no share price is associated with the transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The article does not mention any exploration commitment in terms of meters of drilling.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The article does not mention any monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The article explicitly states there are no royalty obligations on the newly acquired claims: 'The property consists of unpatented lode claims that are 100% owned by the Company, without any royalty obligations or work commitments...'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The article specifies the size of the newly staked area: '...the staking of an additional forty-six Bureau of Land Management ("BLM") lode claims totaling 924 acres near its Jewel Ridge project...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the newly acquired area is specified as acres: '...totaling 924 acres...'

resource_size.justification: The article provides assay results from grab samples but does not state a quantified mineral resource estimate with mass or volume (e.g., tonnes, ounces). It notes: 'While grab rock samples are not representative of the grade of mineralization of an occurrence or target...'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company's ticker and exchange are provided in the first paragraph: 'Golden Lake Exploration Inc. (CSE:GLM)(OTCQB:GOLXF)'
